That would be such a satisfying and filling end.

Compared to the mc that will steal someone’s woman and is scum it would rather choose the dedicated hard working kind husband, I just seem to hate the mc and the wife that cheated on such a good man, she’s a bitch that only knows pleasure and dick size. I hope those two die in a horrible accident, or die painfully, because it hurts to see a good man get thrown away for the sake of pleasure, like what a horny bitch and what a shitty guy.

@zen3rd1234 this is not NTR, this is Netori (the MC is the one doing the stealing), which is similar but the Netori tag does not exist here so the NTR tag is used, which is kinda misleading because Netori is pretty much a softer NTR-like story mostly for people that do not like NTR, a simple change in the POV of the story changes a lot and less fat ,bald, hairy rapists too
